3963247.title: [Auth Controller][Part 1] Add Elevation Reasons for Lockbox
3963247.description:
This PR introduces elevation reasons for Lockbox in the authentication controller.

### Key Features:
- Implements a justification mechanism for elevated access requests.
- Ensures detailed audit logging for security and compliance.
- Updates authentication workflows to enforce justification policies.

### Expected Impact:
- Enhances security and accountability in access elevation.
- Improves traceability for privileged operations.
- Aligns with compliance policies for privileged access management.

### Testing:
- Unit tests to validate justification enforcement.
- Security audit checks to confirm compliance.
- Staging environment tests for integration with authentication workflows.

3963683.title: [Auth Controller][Part 2] Add Lockbox Reason in Sweeper
3963683.description:
This PR integrates Lockbox justification tracking into the sweeper service to ensure full lifecycle auditing.

### Key Features:
- Captures justification data during automated sweeps.
- Enhances security visibility by logging access reasons.
- Ensures non-justified accesses are flagged for review.

### Expected Impact:
- Strengthens security monitoring and compliance tracking.
- Prevents unauthorized access escalation without justification.
- Improves integration with security audits and incident response.

### Testing:
- Validated logs capture justification reasons in sweeper runs.
- Performance testing to ensure minimal overhead.
- Security reviews and compliance verification with audit teams.

3946884.title: Grant Read Permission to CosmicReadOnly
3946884.description:
This PR grants read-only permissions to the CosmicReadOnly role, ensuring controlled access to authentication resources.

### Key Features:
- Adds read-only access for Cosmic service accounts.
- Ensures strict role-based access control (RBAC) compliance.
- Prevents unintended privilege escalations.

### Expected Impact:
- Enhances security by enforcing least privilege access.
- Reduces the risk of accidental modifications in authentication services.
- Improves auditability of service account usage.

### Testing:
- Verified role assignment and read-only enforcement in staging.
- Reviewed audit logs to confirm access behavior.
- Security validation to ensure proper access restrictions.
